message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $10500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9500?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out on a good deal. I can offer it to you for $10000.
I really like the product, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9000?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $9000, but I need to make sure it's worth my while. I can offer it to you for $9200.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $8800?
